description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Satay Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Satay Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 80 g Hart & Soul satay curry recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat and serve your spiced satay noodles in a bowl topped with chopped peanuts and fresh coriander.
